review_data.title: A nice tasty meal
review_data.content: I have to say I was really glad I called in. I was staying in the nearby VISIONAPARTMENTS and was after something tasty to eat and this was the ideal spot. Menu was simple and tasty, fresh ingredients, burrito was of an excellent size so...More

review_data.title: Nice burrito
review_data.content: Very tasty burrito, with a lot of choices of ingredients. The ingredients were of good quality. The atmosphere was friendly and the staff as well. Very moderately priced for Zurich.

review_data.title: Yummy burrito bowl!
review_data.content: Very nice place, with friendly service and staff. They reply immediately my questions about my diet restrictions. The food was also delicious with bigs portions. I totally recommend this place!

review_data.title: Nice Mexican place, cool Ambiente inside and outside!
review_data.content: Dinner out of with friends, excellent central location, nice view over the canal, most friendly staff, interesting drinks, fantastic tacos and more. Simply loved and will definitely be back for more!

review_data.title: Excellent place
review_data.content: Excellent burritos and very friendly staff. Have visited many times and will again :) Half pork half beef is the best choice.

review_data.title: Delicious, honest Burrito
review_data.content: Really enjoyed my vegan burrito with sweet potato filling as a nice alternative to meat! The medium spiced salsa was perfect! I just wish they wouldn't ask 2.- for guac... or at least give more for the price! The staff was also very friendly and...More

review_data.title: Decent quality, well priced food
review_data.content: If you have been to a really good burrito place in a more metropolitan city, this won't impress you. But it is a welcome addition to central Zurich lunch options. I had a naked vegetarian burrito to eat in. The tomato rice is a bit...More

review_data.title: Finally tasty and fast burritos
review_data.content: Went there around 6.30pm and was immediatly served. Great burritos for fair prices compared for what you get at other fast food places (the 2 CHF mark-up for guacamole is a bit much though). Nice staff, good location. I will definitely return.

review_data.title: great food, good value for money, relaxed atmosphere
review_data.content: If you want to have a tasty and filling meal, good quality, and rather quick, in the center of town, then you are absolutely right there.
